list.title: Software Engineer/Technical Consultant
responsibilities: Software engineer and technical support for the consultant team.
Utilising Microsoft technologies (Azure, Power platform and .NET Core) to develop solutions for clients and internal business
Extension development for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central
achievements: Earned a Microsoft Azure Developer Associate Certification
Delivered technical solutions to clients for integration needs.
Core developer of a application for capturing data from an invoice/order documents.

list.title: Finance Casual
responsibilities: Validate invoices from accounts payable and send invoices into their payment system.
Setting up template models (using Regex) for their invoice scanning system to pick up values from invoices coming from their business partners.
achievements: Validated invoices from July and August period.
Set up template models for over 2000 regular business partners from their payment system.

list.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop web application solutions for both clients and in-house business.
Work with teams to design solutions for the web applications.
Specialized on front-end development (AngularJS, Angular6 - 9) but also work on back-end developments when needed (SQL, .NET Framework and .NET Core)
achievements: Lead a development team for an online shopping site belonging to one of the biggest client in our company.
Contributed in the UI development in almost all of the in-house web applications.

list.title: Website Developer
responsibilities: Develop websites using software tools, including content management systems (CMS) such as Joomla! and Drupal.
Manage data and the web server in order to keep the websites running.
Apply Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) knowledge to increase the search rank of the websites.
achievements: Maintained and improved 4-5 content-heavy websites owned by the business.
Winner of 2014 New Zealand Community Newspaper Award (NZCNA) - Overall best website.
